suppress.notes: This appears to be a false-positive as this is only exploitable in Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE which we don't use
Suppress tomcat CVE as there is no updated version.

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-22096#range-7096083 Temporary suppression until upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.6 (current) https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/html/dependency-versions.html#dependency-versions
